## Theemo.build() method

Executes the build command

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
build(config?: BuildConfig): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | BuildConfig | the config for build (if it cannot be auto-detected) |
